languages.text: {n}Вы припоминаете один важный нюанс, что не раз {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}ограждал дворян{/d} от самосуда фанатиков: Экклезиархии нельзя снаряжать собственную армию. Сонм вполне удастся объявить нарушителями, а на десерт — забрать их имущество. В качестве урока смирения, разумеется.{/n}

{n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы припоминаете один важный нюанс, что не раз {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}ограждал дворян{/d} от самосуда фанатиков: Экклезиархии нельзя снаряжать собственную армию. Сонм вполне удастся объявить нарушителями, а на десерт — забрать их имущество. В качестве урока смирения, разумеется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你回想起了某个重要的细节，这个细节曾在很多情况下{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}保护贵族{/d}免受狂热分子的私刑审判。这个细节就是：国教禁止拥有自己的军队。你很容易就能证明阴沉之主违背了教义，还可以借此没收阴沉之主的全部财产，趁机扩充一下你的国库。当然，这么做只是为了给他们一个教训，让他们明白何为谦卑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你回想起了某个重要的细节，这个细节曾在很多情况下{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}保护贵族{/d}免受狂热分子的私刑审判。这个细节就是：国教禁止拥有自己的军队。你很容易就能证明阴沉之主违背了教义，还可以借此没收阴沉之主的全部财产，趁机扩充一下你的国库。当然，这么做只是为了给他们一个教训，让他们明白何为谦卑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは、これまで幾度となく、独断的な正義をふるおうとする狂信者たちから{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}貴族たちを守ってきた{/d}、重大な意味を持つニュアンスを思い出した。帝国聖教会は、自前の軍隊を保有することを禁じられている。この誓約に違反したとして「ホスト」を告発するのは容易であり、おまけにその全財産を押収することもできる。もちろん、謙虚さを学ばせるための教訓として。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは、これまで幾度となく、独断的な正義をふるおうとする狂信者たちから{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}貴族たちを守ってきた{/d}、重大な意味を持つニュアンスを思い出した。帝国聖教会は、自前の軍隊を保有することを禁じられている。この誓約に違反したとして「ホスト」を告発するのは容易であり、おまけにその全財産を押収することもできる。もちろん、謙虚さを学ばせるための教訓として。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Recuerdas un detalle crucial que en numerosas ocasiones ha {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protegido a la nobleza{/d} contra fanáticos que buscan repartir justicia arbitraria: la Eclesiarquía no tiene permiso para tener ejército propio. Sería fácil declarar que la Hueste infringe esta norma y, como bonificación, expropiar todos sus bienes... como lección de humildad, claro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Recuerdas un detalle crucial que en numerosas ocasiones ha {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protegido a la nobleza{/d} contra fanáticos que buscan repartir justicia arbitraria: la Eclesiarquía no tiene permiso para tener ejército propio. Sería fácil declarar que la Hueste infringe esta norma y, como bonificación, expropiar todos sus bienes... como lección de humildad, claro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du erinnerst dich an eine entscheidende Kleinigkeit, die schon mehrmals {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}den Adel beschützt hat{/d}, wenn Eiferer willkürlich für vermeintliche Gerechtigkeit sorgen wollten: Der Ekklesiarchie ist es verboten, ihre eigene Armee auszurüsten. Es sollte kein Problem sein, dem Gastgeber einen Verstoß gegen diese Regel vorzuwerfen und anschließend als Bonus seinen gesamten Besitz zu beschlagnahmen – natürlich nur als Lektion in Demut, versteht sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

Es sollte kein Problem sein, dem Gastgeber einen Verstoß gegen diese Regel vorzuwerfen und anschließend als Bonus seinen gesamten Besitz zu beschlagnahmen – natürlich nur als Lektion in Demut, versteht sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fanatiklerin keyfi adaletinden {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}asilleri defalarca korumuş olan{/d} hayati bir detayı hatırlıyorsun: Ekleşiarşi'nin kendi ordusunu kurması yasaktır. Konakçı'nın bu andı ihlal ettiğini ilan etmek kolay olacak. Cümle aleme ibret olsun diye tüm mallarına el koymak da cabası elbette.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fanatiklerin keyfi adaletinden {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}asilleri defalarca korumuş olan{/d} hayati bir detayı hatırlıyorsun: Ekleşiarşi'nin kendi ordusunu kurması yasaktır. Konakçı'nın bu andı ihlal ettiğini ilan etmek kolay olacak ve elbette, cümle aleme ibret olsun diye tüm mallarına el koymak da cabası.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous rappelez l'importante nuance qui a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protégé la noblesse{/d} plus d'une fois contre les fanatiques souhaitant appliquer leur propre justice. L'Ecclésiarchie n'a pas le droit d'équiper sa propre armée. Il serait si aisé de déclarer que le Concile viole cette loi. Cerise sur le gâteau, vous pourriez saisir toutes ses propriétés. Voilà qui serait une belle leçon d'humilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You recall a crucial nuance that has, on numerous occasions, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}protected the nobility{/d} from zealots looking to dispense arbitrary justice: the Ecclesiarchy is forbidden from outfitting its own army. It should be easy to declare the Host to be in violation of this covenant and, as a pretty bonus, seize all their property afterward — solely as a lesson in humility, of course.{/n}
